title: The Doors: dance on fire
brief_description: The Doors, and in particular their lead singer Jim Morrison, were the Dionysian soundtrack to the counter-cultural storms of the late sixties. This video features live performances, television appearances, interviews and original filmclips of the band including their controversial rendition of “Light My Fire” on the Ed Sullivan Show. Other songs featured include “People Are Strange”, “L.A. Woman”, “Roadhouse Blues”, “The End”, “Riders on a Storm” and the original “Unknown Soldier” filmclip banned in 1968.
